entry.tran: 含有大量俚语的;爱用行话的
entry.def: Slangy speech or writing has a lot of slang in it.

example.ex: The play was full of slangy dialogue.
example.tran: 剧中充斥了大量俚语对话。

means.word_mean: 1. constituting or expressed in slang or given to the use of slang;
